title: Naruto and the Nine Tailed Fox
body:
So basically, I posted the same thing in the Naruto reddit thread, but nobody payed attention to it, so I am going to post this here because I know this game has a very big "anime" following. My question is; why can Naruto not turn into the Nine Tailed Fox? Killer B can turn into (look exactly like) GyÅ«ki, the eight tailed beast (https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/naruto/images/d/d7/Gyuki.png/revision/latest?cb=20140817221249), but Naruto just gets that orange glowing chakra form of the nine tails and looks like this:
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/naruto/images/f/f7/Naruto_transforming.png/revision/latest?cb=20141026161814. Why can't Naruto look like the Nine tails? Thanks.

replies.body: LOVE THIS POST! Starting with that.  SO! The reason why Bee's is different than Naruto's is because every Tailed Beast Transformation is different. Bee decides to take the form of his tailed beast, while Kurama Share's his Chakra with Naruto to give him that tailed beast form. I figure all forms would look different, but you don't get to see too much of that as they  were all killed, nommed on, by the Akatsuki before they get much of a story.
